jd_information.description: URGENT REQUIRED-IMMIGRATION CONSULTANT EXECUTIVE –CHANDIGARH-FEMALE-20KPosition: immigration consultant executive (FULL TIME)Location-ChandigarhSALARY -15K- 20K +INCENTIVES (BASED ON EXPERIENCE)Gender- FEMALE ONLYPLEASE APPLY FEMALE CANDIDATES ONLY Looking for sales oriented female candidate for immigration consultant office, who can manage on her own with less supervision , Should have desire to learn and progress. Who can join immediately . Responsibilities · Able to handle office with on own .with less supervision.· Good communication and convincing Skills· Generating business by converting leads· Providing information about different visa process over calls and emails· Have to deal with the clients who are looking for Australian visa· Able to prepare Visitor Visa Letters, Consular Letters as well as Port of Entry letters.· Able to call high commission· Keeping regular follow up with clients for immigration process· Able to handle and filling student visa , visitor visa spouse visa etc· Should have skills to draft emails and letter for immigration purpose . Profile should include qualities* Candidate should prior Experience in Sales.* Candidate should have pleasing personality.* Candidate should have good command in English.* Candidate should be Quick learner* Candidate have counseling experience Send me updated resumes .email id vaishali.econn@gmail.comContact +91-7973495020
